author: lpernie
body:
CHANGES:
**2018 realistic: 100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4**
Diff with old GT:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v5/100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v6
-> New ECAL thresholds

**100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v4Diff** 
Diff with old GT:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v4/100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v3
-> New ECAL thresholds + HCAL  Channel Quality, LUTCorrs. RespCorrs, ZSThresholds,  QIEData

NOTES:
. The new conditions will be signed off during the PPD meeting on Jan 18
title: [New GT][2018 realistic and cosmic realistic] New ECAL thresholds for 2018
